00023 #ifndef H_SPK_REGISTERABLE

00030 // A macro implementing the clone method for Registerable children
00031 // Note that copyChildren and destroyChildren have to be implemented manually if needed
00032 #define SPK_IMPLEMENT_REGISTERABLE(ClassName) \
00033 \
00034 virtual ClassName* clone(bool createBase) const \
00035 { \
00036             ClassName* cloneObject = new ClassName(*this); \
00037             cloneObject->copyChildren(*this,createBase); \
00038             return cloneObject; \
00039 } \
00040 \
00041 public : \
00042 virtual std::string getClassName() const {return #ClassName;}
00043 
00044 
00045 namespace SPK

00049             
00051             extern SPK_PREFIX const SPK_ID NO_ID;
00052 
00054             extern SPK_PREFIX const std::string NO_NAME;

00086             class SPK_PREFIX Registerable
00087             {

00190

00210 
00212                         // Interface //
00214 
00227                         inline virtual Registerable* findByName(const std::string& name);
00228 
00229             protected :
00230 
00241                         void registerChild(Registerable* child,bool registerAll);
00242 
00253                         Registerable* copyChild(Registerable* child,bool createBase);
00254 
00265                         bool destroyChild(Registerable* child,bool keepChildren);
00266 
00275                         inline void incrementChildReference(Registerable* child);
00276 
00285                         inline void decrementChildReference(Registerable* child);
00286 
00303                         static void registerObject(Registerable* obj,bool registerAll = false);
00304 
00306                         // Virtual methods //
00308

00320 
00331                         virtual void copyChildren(const Registerable& object,bool createBase){};
00332

00355                         inline void decrementReference();

00397             {

00401             inline bool Registerable::isRegistered() const
00402             {
00403                         return ID != NO_ID;
00404             }
00405

00407             {
00408                         return shared;

00412             {

00417             {

00421             inline Registerable* Registerable::findByName(const std::string& name)
00422             {
00423                         return getName().compare(name) == 0 ? this : NULL;
00424             }
00425 
00426             inline void Registerable::incrementReference()
00427             {
00428                         if (isRegistered())
00429                                     ++nbReferences;
00430             }
00431 
00432             inline void Registerable::decrementReference()
00433             {
00434                         if ((isRegistered())&&(nbReferences > 0))
00435                                     --nbReferences;
00436             }
00437 
00438             inline void Registerable::incrementChildReference(Registerable* child)
00439             {
00440                         if ((isRegistered())&&(child != NULL))
00441                                     child->incrementReference();
00442             }
00443 
00444             inline void Registerable::decrementChildReference(Registerable* child)
00445             {
00446                         if ((isRegistered())&&(child != NULL))
00447                                     child->decrementReference();
00448             }
00449 }
